downloadTitle: Security Update for Windows Embedded POSReady 2009 USB Boot system (KB3139398)
downloadDescription: A security issue has been identified for Windows Embedded POSReady 2009 that could affect your system.
detailsSection:
For a complete listing of the issues that are included in this update, see the associated Microsoft Knowledge Base article. You can help protect your system by installing this update from Microsoft.
After you install this update, you may have to restart your system.
The regular (non-boot) USB version of this KB is available via the standard release channels. e.g. Windows Update, etc.
installInstructionSection: Click Download and follow the instructions.

relatedResourcesSection.title: installing POSReady 2009 via USB Flash Drive
